Sentencas: A highly stable electrode material of Ruddlesden-Popper structure, La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 (RPLSMF), is prepared from La0.6Sr0.4Mn0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSMF) perovskite by in situ annealing in flowing H-2 at the operation temperature of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: The crystallinity, morphology, and oxidation states of each element and electrochemical properties of RPLSMF are characterized.
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: Doping Mn into the B-site of RPLSMF improves the phase stability of the structure in H-2 to prevent formation of La2O3.
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: The XPS results also suggest that improved phase stability promotes formation of Fe2+/3+ pairs that facilitate fuel oxidation by redox coupling.
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: Additionally, during phase transition to RPLSMF, metallic Fe nanoparticles form, which enlarge H2 chemisorption and oxidation sites.
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: Consequently, RPLSMF exhibits outstanding and stable electrochemical activity with a maximum power density of 0.72 W cm(-2) at 1073 K when used as an anode material in LSGM electrolyte-supported cells.
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: As the phase transition between the RPLSMF and LSMF is reversible under a redox environment, RPLSMF/GDC is applied as an electrode in the symmetrical cell of RPLSMF-GDC/LSGM/LSMF-GDC.
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: It exhibits a substantial power density of 0.64 W cm(-2) with a total polarization resistance of 0.51 U cm(2).
Titulo: In situ preparation of a La1.2Sr0.8Mn0.4Fe0.6O4 Ruddlesden-Popper phase with exsolved Fe nanoparticles as an anode for SOFCs
